snippet.title: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two -  Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Tick Tock: A Tale for Two here:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/790740/Tick_Tock_A_Tale_for_Two/ 
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/tick-tock-a-tale-for-two
Itch: https://othertales.itch.io/tick-tock-a-tale-for-two

App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tick-tock-a-tale-for-two/id1357651989?ls=1&mt=8 
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.OtherTales.TickTock

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You and your friend find yourselves trapped in two magical clockwork worlds where you have to solve puzzles to escape. 

Neither of you have the whole picture so the only way to get out is to communicate what you see to the other player. Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection. 

For more information about the game visit: https://www.ticktockthegame.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OtherTales 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/othertalesinteractive/
